issues.description: The solution introduces a new LectureName class and declares the lectureName field as LectureName, whereas the problem statement and UML specify lectureName as a String (and the template has no LectureName class). This mismatch will confuse students about the expected type and prevent them from following the exercise as described.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the lectureName field in the solution back to type String (remove or rename the LectureName class) so it matches the UML and the problem description.
